channel.title: Black mesa problem with ".del" button
channel.description: every time i press .del button every npc or doors will dissapear and it start of game i fell off from cabin, how do i turn it off? i tried to change by binding but it does nothing, please help

item.description:
+1.
Stuck in Zoom mode, tried everything. Was surprised to see people disappear when I hit the NumPad period.
